item.description: The NH Animal Rights League will provide Field Roast Hazelnut Cranberry Roasts and gravy. Please bring a traditional side dish or dessert. Let us know what you'll bring so we will have a variety of food. We need mashed potatoes, squash, sweet potatoes, and all of that stuff. After the potluck, at about 2 pm, the NHARL will conduct its annual member meeting which is open to all. Stay for that if you want or just attend the potluck. The choice is yours.
item.name: Gentle Thanksgiving Vegan Potluck
